softredir-desc: Eiks the tag __SOFTREDIR__ tae merk [[Special:SaftRedirectPages|saft redirect pages]]
softredirectpages-summary:
The follaein is a leet o aw saft redirect pages within {{SITENAME}}.
A page is treatit as a saft redirect page if it conteens the tag __SOFTREDIR__ (or a surrogatum alias).
softredirectpagelinks: Pages airtin tae saft redirect pages
softredirectpagelinks-summary:
The follaein pages conteen at least one leek tae a saft redirect page. Thay mey need tae link tae a mair appropriate page insteid.
A page is treatit as a saft redirect page if it conteens the tag __SOFTREDIR__ (or a surrogatum alias).
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-softre: This is a saft redirect page
